column4: Outbound N Broadway near Ballpark Dr
The I-275 East and West exit ramps to I-75S in Erlanger are shutdown for several hours due to an overturned tanker.
Westbound traffic should take I-75N to Exit 186/Buttermilk Pike and re-enter I-75S.
Eastbound traffic should take Exit 4/KY-212 to Donaldson Rd to I-75S.

column3: I-75/I-71 at the Brent Spence Bridge:
column4: UPDATE:  At midnight on Monday 12/21, I-75N will be CLOSED to ALL traffic starting at the I-275 interchange in preparation for the reopening of the bridge.

column3: I-75/I-71 at the Brent Spence Bridge:
